name: HENTAI BATTLEGROUNDS ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
description:
HENTAI BATTLEGROUNDS ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) - is an action shooter that sets groups of girls against each other in a battle for survival. Use skills and tactics to outwit your opponents and become the last person standing.

The player has control of his or her character, and the focus is almost entirely on the defeat of the character's enemies using long-range weaponry.Features:
  • Fast paced anime action
  • Different types of weapons
  • Beautiful visual style and graphics
